DOC.brief_summary: In study , depress veteran hepatitis C randomly assign control group exercise intervention group . The exercise intervention design begin slowly participant progress within participant 's target heart rate range moderate intensity exercise . The exercise intervention 12 week home base walk program . Ideally individual walk 30 minute , moderate intensity , minimum three time per week . However , duration relative intensity tailor individual . Central Hypothesis Veterans receive exercise intervention significantly less symptomatic depression veteran control group .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Exercise Intervention Decrease Depressive Symptoms Veterans With Hepatitis C
